faqs.q: How many calories is in vodka shot exactly?
faqs.a: Approximately 97 kcal for a 1.5 oz shot of 80-proof vodka.

faqs.q: Does vodka have carbs or sugar?
faqs.a: Plain vodka has 0 g carbs and 0 g sugars; calories are purely from alcohol.

faqs.q: What's the calorie difference between vodka and other spirits?
faqs.a: Similar to gin or rum at 97 kcal per shot; whiskey or tequila varies slightly by proof.
